caller_intent: Inform the client that an auto policy cannot be reinstated and must be rewritten, offering to provide a new quote via email.
resolution_steps: Notified the client of the inability to reinstate the auto policy.
Informed the client that a new policy would need to be written.
Offered to prepare and email a quote for the new policy.
Provided a phone number for further questions.
knowledge_required: Client communication protocols for policy changes
summary: Brandy from Alliance Insurance informed Michelle that the auto policy could not be reinstated and would require a new policy. She offered to prepare a quote and send it via email, while providing a phone number for additional questions. The call concluded with a standard sign-off.
